GSD.product_version: versions from v4.19.168 to before v4.19.191
GSD.description:
regmap: set debugfs_name to NULL after it is freed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.19.191 by commit 2dc1554d5f0fdaf47cc5bea442b84b9226fea867, it was introduced in version v4.19.168 by commit 5b654b03007917f3f1015b2a5c288c1ea6ae8f65. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: regmap: set debugfs_name to NULL after it is freed
